frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-dell-command-configure-menu
frozen.shortDescription: Adds submenu in gnome shell to access Dell Command Configure options.
frozen.longDescription:
Adds submenu in gnome shell to access Dell Command Configure options.

Currently, only battery charge settings are implemented.

The Dell Command Configure tool must be installed separately from Dell https://www.dell.com/support/kbdoc/en-uk/000178000/dell-command-configure#Downloads.
